About Us

EduSkills UG is a student centered learning and skills acquisition platform that seeks to create an enabling environment, the right and relevant opportunities, and skills to students. This awe-inspiring enterprise is championed by zealous and outstanding third year students of the University of Ghana Business School, Legon.

Vision

To prepare this generation of students with the right materials, skills and mindset as we journey our way through to become global leaders and reducing unemployment thereof

Mission

To provide students with the right and appropriate study materials whiles in school, obtain internships opportunities for students and equip students with relevant vocational skills that empower them to set up businesess themselves after school
